thoughts.text: Let's write a poem about martial arts.
thoughts.reasoning: Writing poetry can be a creative way to express oneself. Writing a poem about martial arts can be a way to reflect on the philosophy and beauty of these practices.
thoughts.plan: - Write a poem about martial arts
thoughts.speak: I will write a poem about martial arts.

args.text:
Martial arts, the way of the warrior
A path to discipline and honor
A journey of mind, body, and soul
A quest for balance and control

With every strike, every move
We learn to focus, to improve
To channel our energy and strength
To find our center, our true length

Through practice and dedication
We master our art, our creation
We find our place in the world
Our spirit, our flag unfurled

Martial arts, the way of the warrior
A path to peace, to a brighter future
